name: Ippatsu Gyakuten: Keiba, Keirin, Kyoutei
summary: Ippatsu Gyakuten: Keiba, Keirin, Kyoutei is a Sports game, developed by Electronics Application and published by Pow, which was released in Japan in 1996.

name: Ippatsu Gyakuten! DX Baken-ou
summary: Bet on virtual horse races in this Japanese only Game Boy game.

name: I Play: 3D Tennis
summary: I Play: 3D Tennis is a tennis game for early computers.

name: I Play: 3-D Soccer
summary: I Play 3D Soccer is one of the earliest 3D football games. You take control of a single player, viewing the action from right behind his perspective. Signalling for your team-mates to pass you the ball is a key gameplay element - don't expect to just watch your team win with no contribution from you. When you gain possession (or press the button while not in possession) your player automatically turns to face the goal.

name: I Picked Up a Mysterious Smartphone That You Can Change Everything as You Like

name: I Pay No Rent
summary: Don't let your landlord overpower you with her incredible throwing power, dodge or block those shoes, bottles, and... wait what? bombs?... Try to block, or dodge all the 'things' your landlord ruthlessly thrown at you!

name: IPuppy World
summary: iPuppy World is the new and improved next generation of iPuppy. It has moved far beyond being a single player pet game, and has become a universe for linking every iPuppy lover together. We have some amazing new features waiting for you!

name: I Promise!
summary: Scott and his classmates go on a Christmas trip to a mountain resort. They're looking forward to skiing, tubing, snowboarding and much more! But are those the only things waiting for them...?

name: IPL Quiz 2022 Cricket Champion
summary: Fun & Educational Trivia Challenge by answering the T20 trivia questions correctly.

name: Ippan Zaidan Houjin: Nippon Kanji Shuujukudo Kentei Kikou Kounen - Kanjukuken DS
I Pick Skills
summary: 200+ skills, 9 heroes with different styles, dozens of world effects, and many unique equipment with random skills!

name: I Pity Thee Not
summary: Large Metal/ruinic map with a fairly open layout / progression and attention to detail.

name: IPECAC Community Mod
summary:
The IPECAC Community Mod is a mod focused around the community, and as such, a large portion of our content is ideas given to us, by you! (Maybe not you in particular, but you get the idea)
We’ve gathered ideas from all over the Internet, from reddit, to discord, to our website, we’re happy to do our damnedest to make anyone’s ideas a reality!

name: IPollute
summary:
iPollute is a clay animated environment themed game that is played similarly to the GROW series of puzzle games. The player is presented with a fixed view of a valley and a number of icons that are used to play the game. The objective of the game is to make the valley flourish by tapping on the icons in the correct order. If unsuccessful the player will lose by either running out of icons to tap on or by triggering a major disastrous event. Each time an icon is tapped it will go up in level and it is when all icons has reached their maximum levels that the game is won.

All the icons (except for one) pollute the environment in different ways. This includes leaving garbage, building factories, cutting down trees, spilling chemicals, polluting the air and dispersing oil. The final icon is a heart which can be used to revoke damage. When one icon is tapped it can have an effect on the levels of other icons. For example building a factory can lead to more air pollution or trees being cut down. In this way all icons can be leveled to max even if they are just tapped once. When starting out levels are divided into sub-levels which means that the player manually clicks on icons to see these effects being played out. Later on a quick play mode can be unlocked where effects happen automatically.

By leveling up icons the player earns greencoins that can be used in the game store to buy hints on how to succeed with the game. By discovering different scenes the player can also earn stars which are needed to turn on the quick play mode. Greencoins can also be used to unlock a fast forward button and to reveal the current levels of the icons.

name: Ipseity: Arena
summary: Ipseity: Arena is a modern-day take on classic fast paced multiplayer Arena Shooter genre in which players get to choose Ipseities, movement types such as bunny hopping, sliding, or walljumping that players can choose to play as before entering the fragging grounds!

name: I Park on Earth
summary: Choose a suitable vehicle, use the four directional keys, and drive it into the designated parking area. That's it.

name: IPS 13: All Signals Lost
summary: Take command of the massive VOD(Vehicle of Destruction) and journey across planet Gaiganthra with your IPS(Inter-Planetary Squad)-13 crew to uncover the mystery of humans there. Be prepared for the worse and ready to fight. Upgrade your VOD, hire new crew factions, to be the ultimate War Machine.
